request.description: Gets the specified writer by the Id in the url

request.description: Allows you to modify the a writer's values in the database. The writer modified is the one with the id sent in the url
Adds the user of Id in url to add as friend of the user currently logged in. The one the token belongs to.

response.name: Add Friend (You are not logged in)

request.description: Unfriends the user that belongs to the url id from the user logged in. The current user is the one who's token is being used

response.name: Unfriend
response.body: You are not friends with Joaquin anymore

response.name: Unfriend (When you aren't friends)
response.body: Can't remove friend since you aren't friends

request.description: Shows all the friends for the user identified in the url by the id
Creates a file with the values from the request body for the folder identified by the url Id

response.name: Create (A file in a folder that you don't own)
response.body: You are not owner of this folder

response.name: Create (When you try to create a file in a folder that is not yours)
response.body: This user is not allow to Write this element
